author: joshf
title: DeFi and Microlending for Africa
description: How can we enable the creation of micro-lending, payments and DeFi dApp solutions that fit the African setting?
importance: Microlending and DeFi dApps targeted specifically to the African context & based on historical cultural norms will accelerate user adoption.
success: At least 5 viable projects with implementation plans for DeFi dApps, micropayment and microlending solutions in Africa.
